channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bad RTC, 25th October
item.description:
Nasty speeding RTC at this location this morning (I heard it happen as I live here, and reported it to the police myself). 3 cars written off, possibly lots of car debris (plastic, metal, glass, fluids) in the road and gutter. Will probably need some attention/cleaning. I think Albemarle should have another couple speed cameras because speeding is a problem on this long straight road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albemarle Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light is flickering on and off, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned vehicle for over 6 months, 25th October

item.title: Construction waste in public space, 25th October
item.description:

item.title: Zebra crossing beacon cover, 24th October
item.description:
One of the covers over the zebra crossing beacons has moved round after the recent strong winds, meaning the beacon is now flashing directly into the bedrooms at night. Could this be rectified, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pieces of dismantled furniture left by bin area, 24th October
item.description:
Several large pieces of dismantled furniture have been left by the bin area. Action needed to remove. The bin area is located on Purbrook estate, on the corner of Riley Road. Opposite no. 88.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Purbrook Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Furniture and waste, 24th October
